sn35.122:1.3: Katame ca, bhikkhave, samyojaniya dhamma, katamanca samyojanam?
sn35.122:1.4: Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.122:1.6: Yo tattha chandarago, tam tattha samyojanam …pe…
sn35.122:1.8: santi, bhikkhave, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.122:1.10: Yo tattha chandarago tam tattha samyojanan”ti.
